COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Michael Wuertz
$Simon left due to injury
Perez tagged Casey and they both fell; Perez dropped the ball into Casey's lap and started to walk away; Casey threw the ball at Perez and they had to be separated by teammates
Game called for rain
$fan interference
ej,hurdc001,M,hudsm901,Balls and strikes Rockies Manager Clint Hurdle ejected by HP umpire Marvin Hudson
$Casey left game with injured leg
$great catch hanging over rail into SLN dugout
$ball well over fence, great catch by Edmonds to bring it back; he looked like a kid after catch with huge smile
$Larson left game with injured leg
ej,andem003,P,wintm901,Called third strike Marlon Anderson ejected by HP umpire Mike Winters
$Edmonds left game with injured back
$Felipe Lopez called for obstruction
Suspend=20040731,,1,3,32 41 minute rain delay before start of game; Harang had thrown 4 warm-up pitches when the delay was called
$Jason Larue called for interference
27 minute rain delay; Todd Jones threw gum & sunflower seeds into the stands during delay; he was traded to Philadelphia shortly after (not as a result of the gum throwing)
$heavy rain started during Bagwell's at bat
suspended,20040731,CIN09,rain $Game suspended at this point for rain, completed next day
$Joe Vizcaino called for interference
ej,riedj001,P,fleta901,Balls and strikes John Riedling ejected by HP umpire Andy Fletcher
$Freel left game with injured knee
$bounced on the street outside the park onto a piece of driftwood on the Ohio River; estimated 535'
$Bradley left game with injured leg
$Vander Wal left game with injured knee
$Ojeda left game with injured hand
$Oswalt left game with injured chest
$fan interference
$Pratt backed into Thome as he caught the popup

$Pratt caught one pitch to Casey and then left game with bruised left shoulder; Hinch's first game for Philadelphia
$Casey destroyed a trash can behind the dugout after striking out
